languages.text: Темные боги были разъярены предательством свое{mf|го|й} чемпион{mf|а|ки}, столь щедро получавше{mf|го|й} их дары и столь вероломно отвергше{mf|го|й} их ради нового владыки. Но ни гнев владык Имматериума, ни оружие присягнувших им воинов не могли уязвить т{mf|ого|у}, что был{mf||а} огражден{mf||а} могуществом истинного божества.

The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.
languages.original_text: Темные боги были разъярены предательством свое{mf|го|й} чемпион{mf|а|ки}, столь щедро получавше{mf|го|й} их дары и столь вероломно отвергше{mf|го|й} их ради нового владыки. Но ни гнев владык Имматериума, ни оружие присягнувших им воинов не могли уязвить т{mf|ого|у}, что был{mf||а} огражден{mf||а} могуществом истинного божества.

traits.locale_text: The Dark Gods were infuriated by the betrayal of their champion, so quick to accept their generous gifts, yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for the new master. However, no matter the wrath of the Lords of Immaterium, no matter the weapons of their loyal warriors, nothing could hurt the one guarded by the power of a true deity.

The Dark Gods were infuriated by the betrayal of their champion, so quick to accept their generous gifts, yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for the new master. However, no matter the wrath of the Lords of Immaterium, no matter the weapons of their loyal warriors, nothing could hurt the one guarded by the power of a true deity.

The Dark Gods were infuriated by the betrayal of their champion, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

The Dark Gods were infuriated by the betrayal of their champion, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

languages.text: 黑暗诸神对他们勇士的背叛感到愤怒。这个人如此迅速地接受了他们慷慨的礼物，随后却又毫不留恋地背弃了祂们，寻找新的主人。然而，无论是亚空间主宰的愤怒，还是祂们忠诚战士的武器，都无法伤害到这个被真神力量所保护的人。
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗诸神对祂们勇士的背叛感到愤怒。这个人如此迅速地接受了祂们慷慨的礼物，随后却又热切地背弃了祂们，寻找新的主人。然而，无论是亚空间主宰的愤怒，还是祂们忠诚战士的武器，都无法伤害到这个被真神力量所保护的人。

languages.text: Die Dunklen Götter waren erzürnt über den Verrat {mf|ihres Streiters, der|ihrer Streiterin, die} ihre großzügigen Geschenke so schnell akzeptiert hatte, sie aber auch ebenso leicht heimtückisch zugunsten eines neuen Meisters verraten hatte. Weder der Zorn der Herren des Immateriums noch die Waffen ihrer treuen Krieger konnten aber {mf|dem Mann etwas anhaben, der|der Frau etwas anhaben, die} von der Macht einer wahren Gottheit beschützt wurde.
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: Die Dunklen Götter waren erzürnt über den Verrat {mf|ihres Streiters, der|ihrer Streiterin, die} ihre großzügigen Geschenke so schnell akzeptiert hatte, sie aber auch ebenso leicht heimtückisch zugunsten eines neuen Meisters verraten hatte. Weder der Zorn der Herren des Immateriums noch die Waffen ihrer treuen Krieger konnten aber {mf|dem Mann etwas anhaben, der|der Frau etwas anhaben, die} von der Macht einer wahren Gottheit beschützt wurde.

languages.text: La trahison de leur {mf|champion|championne} rendit les Dieux Sombres fous de rage, {mf|lui|elle} qui avait si facilement accepté leurs dons généreux, pour ensuite les abandonner en faveur d'un nouveau maître. Cependant, ni le courroux des maîtres de l'Immaterium ni les armes de leurs loyaux guerriers ne pouvaient nuire {mf|au protégé|à la protégée} d'une véritable divinité.
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: La trahison de leur {mf|champion|championne} rendit les Dieux Sombres fous de rage, {mf|lui|elle} qui avait si facilement accepté leurs dons généreux, pour ensuite les abandonner en faveur d’un nouveau maître. Cependant, ni le courroux des maîtres de l'Immaterium ni les armes de leurs loyaux guerriers ne pouvaient nuire {mf|au protégé|à la protégée} d'une véritable divinité.

languages.text: Los Dioses Oscuros estaban enfurecidos ante la traición de su campe{mf|ón|ona}, tan dispuest{mf|o|a} a aceptar sus regalos como a abandonarlos por un nuevo amo. A pesar de ello, ni la furia de los amos del Inmaterio ni las armas de sus leales guerreros podían alcanzar a alguien protegido por el poder de una auténtica deidad.
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: Los Dioses Oscuros estaban enfurecidos ante la traición de su campe{mf|ón|ona}, tan dispuest{mf|o|a} a aceptar sus regalos como a abandonarlos por un nuevo amo. A pesar de ello, ni la furia de los amos del Inmaterio ni las armas de sus leales guerreros podían alcanzar a alguien protegido por el poder de una auténtica deidad.

languages.text: 暗黒神は、自分たちが選んだ王者の裏切りに激怒した。自分たちの惜しみない贈り物をためらいなく受け取っておきながら、新たな主人のためにそれを裏切り、捨てようとしたのだ。しかし、非物質世界の主人たちの怒りも、忠実な戦士たちの武器も、真の神の力に守られた者を傷つけることはできなかった。
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: 暗黒神は、自分たちが選んだ王者の裏切りに激怒した。自分たちの惜しみない贈り物をためらいなく受け取っておきながら、新たな主人のためにそれを裏切り、捨てようとしたのだ。しかし、非物質世界の主人たちの怒りも、忠実な戦士たちの武器も、真の神の力に守られた者を傷つけることはできなかった。

languages.text: Kara Tanrılar, cömert armağanlarını kolaylıkla kabul eden ancak yeni bir efendi bulunca hemen onları bir kenara atan müdafilerinin ihanetine çok öfkelendi. Ancak ona ne Tindiyar'ın efendilerinin öfkesi ne de onların sadık savaşçılarının silahları zarar verebilirdi. Nihayetinde tek gerçek ilahın gücüyle korunuyordu.
languages.original_text: The Dark Gods were enraged by their champion's betrayal, so quick to accept their generous gifts, and yet so eager to treacherously abandon them for a new master. However, neither the wrath of the masters of the Immaterium nor the weapons of their loyal warriors could harm the one protected by the power of a true deity.

traits.locale_text: Karanlık Tanrılar, cömert armağanlarını kolaylıkla kabul eden ancak yeni bir efendi bulunca hemen onları bir kenara atan şampiyonlarının ihaneti nedeniyle öfkelendiler. Ancak ona ne Tindiyar'ın efendilerinin öfkesi, ne de onların sadık savaşçılarının silahları zarar verebilirdi. Nihayetinde tek gerçek ilahın gücüyle korunuyordu.
